EmailTemplate.description: Used on IEP Bank Account Setup OSCAR Process
EmailTemplate.name: IEP Setup SanityCheck Passed
EmailTemplate.subject: Ref nr {!AMS_OSCAR__c.Name} – Register/Update of IEP Bank Account
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Sir/Madam,
We have well received your request for registering your Bank Account for EasyPay services. We will inform you as soon as the registration is completed. Don’t hesitate to contact the IATA Customer Service team for more information.
Thank you. IATA Customer Service Portal
